And the LORD<S>3068</S> spake<S>1696</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S>, saying<S>559</S>,
Speak<S>1696</S> unto the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, and take<S>3947</S> of every one of them a rod<S>4294</S> <S>4294</S> according to the house<S>1004</S> of their fathers<S>1</S>, of all their princes<S>5387</S> according to the house<S>1004</S> of their fathers<S>1</S> twelve<S>8147</S> <S>6240</S> rods<S>4294</S>: write<S>3789</S> thou every man's<S>376</S> name<S>8034</S> upon his rod<S>4294</S>.
And thou shalt write<S>3789</S> Aaron's<S>175</S> name<S>8034</S> upon the rod<S>4294</S> of Levi<S>3878</S>: for one<S>259</S> rod<S>4294</S> shall be for the head<S>7218</S> of the house<S>1004</S> of their fathers<S>1</S>.
And thou shalt lay them up<S>3240</S> in the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S> before<S>6440</S> the testimony<S>5715</S>, where I will meet<S>3259</S> with you.
And it shall come to pass, that the man's<S>376</S> rod<S>4294</S>, whom I shall choose<S>977</S>, shall blossom<S>6524</S>: and I will make to cease<S>7918</S> from me the murmurings<S>8519</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, whereby they murmur<S>3885</S> against you.
And Moses<S>4872</S> spake<S>1696</S> unto the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, and every one of their princes<S>5387</S> gave<S>5414</S> him a rod<S>4294</S> <S>4294</S> apiece, for each prince<S>5387</S> <S>5387</S> one<S>259</S> <S>259</S>, according to their fathers'<S>1</S> houses<S>1004</S>, even twelve<S>6240</S> <S>8147</S> rods<S>4294</S>: and the rod<S>4294</S> of Aaron<S>175</S> was among<S>8432</S> their rods<S>4294</S>. <sup>a rod: Heb. a rod for one prince, a rod for one prince</sup>
And Moses<S>4872</S> laid up<S>3240</S> the rods<S>4294</S> before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> in the tabernacle<S>168</S> of witness<S>5715</S>.
And it came to pass, that on the morrow<S>4283</S> Moses<S>4872</S> went<S>935</S> into the tabernacle<S>168</S> of witness<S>5715</S>; and, behold, the rod<S>4294</S> of Aaron<S>175</S> for the house<S>1004</S> of Levi<S>3878</S> was budded<S>6524</S>, and brought forth<S>3318</S> buds<S>6525</S>, and bloomed<S>6692</S> blossoms<S>6731</S>, and yielded<S>1580</S> almonds<S>8247</S>.
And Moses<S>4872</S> brought out<S>3318</S> all the rods<S>4294</S> from before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> unto all the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>: and they looked<S>7200</S>, and took<S>3947</S> every man<S>376</S> his rod<S>4294</S>.
And the LORD<S>3068</S> said<S>559</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S>, Bring<S>7725</S> Aaron's<S>175</S> rod<S>4294</S> again<S>7725</S> before<S>6440</S> the testimony<S>5715</S>, to be kept<S>4931</S> for a token<S>226</S> against the rebels<S>4805</S> <S>1121</S>; and thou shalt quite take away<S>3615</S> their murmurings<S>8519</S> from me, that they die<S>4191</S> not. <sup>rebels: Heb. children of rebellion</sup>
And Moses<S>4872</S> did<S>6213</S> so: as the LORD<S>3068</S> commanded<S>6680</S> him, so did<S>6213</S> he.
And the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> spake<S>559</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S>, saying<S>559</S>, Behold, we die<S>1478</S>, we perish<S>6</S>, we all perish<S>6</S>.
Whosoever cometh any thing near<S>7131</S> unto the tabernacle<S>4908</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> shall die<S>4191</S>: shall we be consumed<S>8552</S> with dying<S>1478</S>?
